00025 class OutputterBase
00026 {
00027     friend class OutputManager;
00028 protected:
00030 
00032     typedef std::string Tag;
00033 protected:
00035     explicit OutputterBase(const Tag & type_tag, const Tag & freq_tag) : type_tag_(type_tag), freq_tag_(freq_tag) {}
00037 
00039     virtual ~OutputterBase() {}
00041     virtual void open_file() = 0;
00043     virtual void add_group(Group * const gp) = 0;
00045     virtual void do_operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop) = 0;
00047     const Tag & type_tag() {
00048         return type_tag_;
00049     }
00051     const Tag & freq_tag() {
00052         return freq_tag_;
00053     }
00055     virtual void export_ID() = 0;
00056 private:
00057     const Tag freq_tag_; // outputting during sim ('during') or at the end ('end')
00058     const Tag type_tag_; // weight, rate, spike
00059 };
00060

00062 
00064 
00069 template < class FileWrapper
00070 , class OutputOperation
00071 , class NeuronListHandler >
00072 class OutputterImpl
00073         : public OutputterBase
00074         , public FileWrapper
00075         , public OutputOperation
00076         , public NeuronListHandler
00077 {
00078 public:
00080 
00085     OutputterImpl(const Tag & type_tag, const Tag & freq_tag
00086                   , const typename FileWrapper::InitValue & init_1
00087                   , const typename OutputOperation::InitValue & init_2
00088                   , const typename NeuronListHandler::InitValue & init_3)
00089             : FileWrapper(init_1)
00090             , OutputOperation(init_2)
00091             , NeuronListHandler(init_3)
00092             , OutputterBase(type_tag, freq_tag) {
00093     }
00094 
00096     inline void open_file() {
00097         NeuronListHandler::send_info_to_file_wrapper(this, this);
00098         FileWrapper::open_file();
00099     }
00100 
00102 
00104     ~OutputterImpl() {
00105         FileWrapper::close_file();
00106     }
00107 
00108 protected:
00110     void add_group(Group * const gp) {
00111         NeuronListHandler::add_group(gp);
00112     }
00113 
00115     void do_operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop) {
00116         NeuronListHandler::template iterate<OutputOperation, FileWrapper>(t_start, t_stop, this, this);
00117     }
00118 
00120     void export_ID() {
00121         NeuronListHandler::template export_ID<OutputOperation, FileWrapper>(this, this);
00122     }
00123 };

00135 class OutputManager
00136 {
00137 // initialisation and destruction
00138 public:
00139     static void set(std::ifstream & is);
00140     static void add_group_to_outputter(const Size & outputter_id, Group * const gp);
00141 private:
00142     static void add_outputter(const std::string & key, const std::string & freq_tag, const std::string & output_file_type = "ascii");
00143     static std::string make_name(const std::string & name_base) {
00144         return name_base + StringFormatter::IntToStr(outputter_count_++);
00145     }
00146 
00147 // accessors to members
00148 public:
00149     static inline unsigned & i_outputting_period() {
00150         return i_outputting_period_;
00151     }
00152     static inline const Time & outputting_period() {
00153         return outputting_period_;
00154     }
00155 
00156 // calls for writing in files and update functions
00157 public:
00159     static void open_files();
00160     static void close_all();
00161     static void do_output(const std::string & freq_tag);
00162     static void clear_past_of_spike_lists(
00163 #ifdef PARALLELSIM
00164         ParNetwork & net);
00165 #else
00166         Network & net);
00167 #endif
00168     static void do_output_connectivity(const std::list<Size> & list_nb_pre_nrn, const std::list<Size> & list_nb_post_nrn, int bide);
00169 
00170 // members

00179     static Size outputter_count_;
00181     static bool clear_spike_lists_;
00183     typedef std::vector<OutputterBase *> OutputterListType;
00184     static OutputterListType outputter_list_;
00185 //  typedef std::map<std::string, OutputterBase * const> OutputterListType;
00187     static AsciiFileWrapper connectivity_output_;

00192 };
